tool_description: The default API of Quran.com website
name: Quran Com
title: Quran Com

api_list.name: verses by page
api_list.description: Get all verses of a specific Madani Mushaf page(1 to 604)

required_parameters.name: page_number
required_parameters.description: Madani Mushaf page number. Valid range is 1-604

optional_parameters.name: translation_fields
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of translation fields if you want to add more fields for each translation.

optional_parameters.name: word_fields
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of word fields if you want to add more fields for each word.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: records per api call, you can get maximum 50 records.

optional_parameters.name: words
optional_parameters.description:
Include words of each ayah?

0 or false will not include words.

1 or true will include the words.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paginating within the result

optional_parameters.name: tafsirs
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated ids of tafisrs to load for each ayah if you want to load tafisrs.

optional_parameters.name: audio
optional_parameters.description: Id of recitation if you want to load audio of each ayah.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language to fetch word translation in specific language.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: comma separated  list of ayah fields.

optional_parameters.name: translations
optional_parameters.description: comma separated ids of translations to load for each ayah.

verse_key.description: key of the verse, key is generated using chapter number and ayah number. e.g 1:1 is first ayah of first surah.

text_uthmani.description:
Ayah text in Uthmani Script.

Uthmani script is an old-fashion script used by the third Caliph, Uthman, to produce the first standard quran manuscript.

text_imlaei.description:
Ayah text in Imla'ei script.

Imla'ei script, is the modern Arabic writing style which is currently in use.

page_number.description: page_number is deperacted, please use `v1_page` instead.
page_number is deperacted, please use `v1_page` instead.

line_number.description: Line number in the Muhsaf for this word

code_v1.description: glyph code that you can use to render the word using QCF  v1 font.

code_v2.description: glyph code that you can use to render the word using QCF  v2 font.

v1_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v1 font. If `v1_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this word using v1 glyph codes.

v2_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v2 font. If `v2_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v2 glyph codes.

text.description: Text of the translation, text could have HTML tags for formatting and footnotes.

code_v1.description: Glyphs codes for QCF v1 fonts

code_v2.description: Glyphs codes for QCF v2 fonts

v1_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v1 font. If `v1_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v1 glyph codes.

v2_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v2 font. If `v2_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v2 glyph codes.

api_list.name: rub el hizb recitations
api_list.description: Get list of ayah recitations for a Rub el Hizb.

required_parameters.name: recitation_id
required_parameters.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL

api_list.name: uthmani simple text
api_list.description: Get Uthmani simple script(without tashkiq/diacritical marks) of ayah. Use query strings to filter results, leave all query string blank if you want to fetch script of whole Quran.

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific surah.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific ayah.

api_list.name: tafirs by id
api_list.description:
Get a single tafsir

See tafsirs endpoint to fetch available tafsirs.

You can also include more fields of tafsir using `fields` query string.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: comma seperated fields of tafsir.

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific ayah.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific surah.

api_list.name: glyph code QCF v1 font
api_list.description: Get glyph codes of ayah for QCF v1 font

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific ayah.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific surah.

v1_page.description: Madani Muhsaf page number. You can use `v1_page` to generate css and font faces for QCF page font.

api_list.name: recitations by id
api_list.description:
Get list of reciters for a single recitaiton. See reciters endpoint to fetch available recitations.

You can also include more fields of audio files using `fields` query string.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific surah.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific ayah.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: comma seperated field of audio files.

api_list.name: indopak text
api_list.description: Get Indopak script of ayah. Use query strings to filter results, leave all query string blank if you want to fetch Indopak script of whole Quran.

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get indopak script of a specific ayah.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get indopak script of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get indopak script of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get indopak script of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get indopak script of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get indopak script of a specific surah.

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: search quran text

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number, well for pagination. You can use *p* as well

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
ISO code of language, use this query params if you want to boost translations for specific language.
For list of available language see  #endpoint:8rjMCZEyPEZMHAKz9 endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Search query, you can use *query* as well

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Results per page. *s* is also valid parameter.

api_list.name: Tajweed colored uthmani text
api_list.description: Get Uthmani color coded tajweed text of ayah. Tajweed rules are embeded in text as `tajweed` html tags.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific surah.

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific ayah.

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific hizb.

api_list.name: reciters
api_list.description: Get list of reciters

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Name of reciters in specific language. Will fallback to English if we don't have names in specific language.

files_size.description: Total size of all audio files in KBs

api_list.name: translation by id
api_list.description:
Get a single translation

see translations endpoint to fetch available translations.

You can also include more fields of translation using `fields` query string.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific surah.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific ayah.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: comma seperated fields of translation.

text.description: Text of the translation, text could have HTML tags for formatting and footnotes.

Id of reciter for which you want to get the recitations. You can fetch list of all reciters from this endpoint

#endpoint:ZQvDmxKn7fQwLrAfy

api_list.description: Get details of a single chapter.

name.description: Name of the resource in specific language.

api_list.name: info
api_list.description: Get chapters information in specific language. Default to `English`.

text.description: Long text of chapter info, this could include html tags for formatting and styling.

source.description: Name of the source, could be a book name or site name.

api_list.name: juz
api_list.description: Get list of all juz
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quran-com.p.rapidapi.com/juzs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quran-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quran-com.p.rapidapi.com/juzs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quran-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

code_v1.description: Glyphs codes for QCF v1 fonts

v1_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v1 font. If `v1_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v1 glyph codes.

v2_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v2 font. If `v2_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v2 glyph codes.

api_list.name: list hizb
api_list.description: Get list of ayah recitations for a Hizb.

required_parameters.name: recitation_id
required_parameters.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL

api_list.name: recitation info by id
api_list.description: Get information of a specific recitation. Could include detail about the reciter, recitation style. When and who recorded it etc.

api_list.name: verse media
api_list.description: Get media related to the verse.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quran-com.p.rapidapi.com/resources/verse_media"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quran-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quran-com.p.rapidapi.com/resources/verse_media"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quran-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: tafsir info by id
api_list.description: Get the information of a specific tafsir. Could include information about the author, when it was published etc.

api_list.name: languages
api_list.description:
Get all languages. You can get translated names of languages in specific language using `language` query parameter. For example

  ```
  /resources/languages?language=ur
  ```

will return language names translated into Urdu

iso_code.description: iso code of the language, you'll pass this code in api calls for fetching content in specific language.

name.description: Name of the resource in specific language.

api_list.name: tafsirs
api_list.description: Get list of available tafsirs.

api_list.name: translations
api_list.description:
Get list of available translations. Use `language` query to get translated names of authors in specific language(e.g language=ur will send translation names in Urdu).

For list of available language see  #endpoint:EZsWyDnekGaDKaCpt endpoint.

api_list.name: recitations by chapter number
api_list.description: Get list of ayah recitations for a Surah.

required_parameters.name: recitation_id
required_parameters.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL

api_list.name: chapters info
api_list.description: Get list of chaper info we've in different languages.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quran-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: translation info by id
api_list.description: Get information of a specific translation. Could include detail about the author, publishing date and publisher etc.

api_list.name: recitations
api_list.description: Get list of available Recitations.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Name of reciters in specific language. Will fallback to English if we don't have names in specific language.

api_list.name: recitation style
api_list.description: Get the available recitation styles.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: recitations by juz number

required_parameters.name: recitation_id
required_parameters.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL

api_list.name: simple text without tashkil/diacritical
api_list.description: Get Imlaei simple script(without tashkil/diacritical marks) of ayah.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific ayah.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific surah.

api_list.name: recitations by page number
api_list.description: Get list of ayah recitations for a Madani Mushaf page.

required_parameters.name: recitation_id
required_parameters.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL

api_list.name: glyph codes QCF v2 font
api_list.description: Get glyph codes of ayah for QCF v2 font

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific surah.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get text of a specific ayah.

v2_page.description: Madani Muhsaf page number. You can use `v2_page` to generate css and font faces for QCF page font.

api_list.name: uthmani text
api_list.description: Get Uthmani script of ayah. Use query strings to filter results, leave all query string blank if you want to fetch Uthmani script of whole Quran.

optional_parameters.name: juz_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific juz.

optional_parameters.name: chapter_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific surah.

optional_parameters.name: hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific hizb.

optional_parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific Rub el Hizb.

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a Madani Muhsaf page

optional_parameters.name: verse_key
optional_parameters.description: If you want to get Uthmani script of a specific ayah.
